name: Five Star Games II
overview: A five game compilation of games originally published as stand alone titles. Part two of Beau Jolly's Five Star Games series. Galaforce: a single player Galaga variant by Kevin Edwards and Martin Galway, originally released by Superior/Acornsoft in 1986. Karate Combat: a fighting game for up to 2 players by Martin Sykes, originally released by Superior Software in 1986. Moon Mission: a single player Lunar Rescue variant by Andrew Harley, originally released by Superior Software in 1984. Stock Car: a top down car racing game for up to two players by A. W. Halse, originally released by Micro Power in 1983. Thrust: a single player scrolling shooter by Jeremy Smith, originally released by Superior Software in 1986.
